description: Bootstrap v3.2.0 dropdown component JavaScript implementation, defining Dropdown class with toggle and keyboard navigation functionalities, and event handling for dropdown menus.

classes.name: Dropdown
classes.description: Class representing dropdown menu behavior, including toggle and keyboard navigation methods.

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Method to toggle the dropdown menu open or closed.

methods.name: keydown
methods.description: Method to handle keyboard navigation within the dropdown menu.
